column4: how do you recover files that nautilus has somehow magicked away?
use your magick to get them back... seriously, how did the files disappear?

I inserted a dvd, when nautilus asked me if I wanted to make a new dvd, did so. When the make dvd nautilus window popped up, I dragged about 4gb of files into it. They disappeared from the source folder, and didn't show up in the burn window
